gigpower
=========

gigpower will solve your problem of where to start with documentation,
by providing a basic explanation of how to do it easily.

Look how easy it is to use:

    import gigpower
    # Get your stuff done
    gigpower.do_stuff()

Features
--------

- Be awesome
- Make things faster

Installation
------------

Install gigpower by running:

    install gigpower

Contribute
----------

- Issue Tracker: github.com/gigpower/gigpower/issues
- Source Code: github.com/gigpower/gigpower

Support
-------
This project is maintained by the Lawrence Berkeley National Lab
Grid Integration Group. 
For support, contact Daniel Arnold at: dbarnold@lbl.gov

License
-------
